parameters.command: sudo yum install -y glibc* libicu wget which

wget https://github.com/microsoft/omi/releases/download/v1.8.1-0/omi-1.8.1-0.ssl_300.ulinux.s.x64.rpm -O omi.rpm && if [ $(md5sum omi.rpm | awk '{print $1}') != '63db2ff0af4ade266f836c935374fedf' ]; then exit 1; else rpm -fi omi.rpm; fi

wget https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v7.4.1/powershell-7.4.1-1.rh.x86_64.rpm -O powershell.rpm && if [ $(md5sum powershell.rpm | awk '{print $1}') != 'be68d1e5c567415848deab0587202726' ]; then exit 1; else rpm -fi powershell.rpm --nodeps; fi
